sentences.english: Nominated for Oscar Best Foreign Language Film in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 本片荣获1998年奥斯卡最佳外语片提名。

sentences.english: The product obtained third prize of BengBu Technical Progress in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 该产品荣获2005年蚌埠市科技进步三等奖。

sentences.english: The education and teaching research results of the school won lots of award from district, municipal, provincial and state government.
sentences.chinese: 教育教学研究成果多次荣获国家及省市区的奖励。

sentences.english: Czech licensing brace for Quality Gold Award.
sentences.chinese: 中捷牌摇钻连续荣获国家质量金奖。

sentences.english: Eight the biggest agency company awarded CCTVs honor.
sentences.chinese: 八次荣获CCTV的最大代理公司的荣誉。

sentences.english: He has a PhD in history from La Trobe University.
sentences.chinese: 他还荣获拉筹伯大学的历史博士学位。

sentences.english: Two of my books respectively won the first-class reward and the second-class reward of national excellent books.
sentences.chinese: 我的两本书分别荣获全国优秀图书一等奖和二等奖。

sentences.english: He won the Congressional Gold Medal two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，荣获国会金质奖章。

sentences.english: Chase won the Harvard Lampoon Lifetime Achievement Award in 1996.
sentences.chinese: 1996年，蔡斯荣获《哈佛讽刺》终身成就奖。

sentences.english: Ting-Fu Liao received the scholarship award from Novatek Corp.
sentences.chinese: 廖挺富，荣获联咏科技公司奖学金。

sentences.english: Maple Garden won the Award of the Top 10 Star Areas of Beijing in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 东润风景曾荣获2000年北京市十大明星楼盘奖。

sentences.english: Won the "State Sanitation City" title in 2002.
In 1992, the ensemble won the Grand Prize of the National Folk Music and Dance Competition.
sentences.chinese: 1992年又在全国民间音乐舞蹈团比赛中荣获大奖。

sentences.english: For this movie he was given the Silver Berlin Bear Award for Best Actor.
sentences.chinese: 他因此片而荣获柏林电影节最佳男演员银熊奖。

sentences.english: Caspar Henderson is an award-winning writer and journalist on environmental affairs.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯帕？亨德森是一位荣获环境新闻奖的作家和记者。

sentences.english: Lou was honored the Third Beijing Venture Award for Outstanding Overseas Returnees.
sentences.chinese: 曾荣获“第三届北京市留学人员创业奖”。

definition: to elect as/to choose as/to consider as
(of a list, music chart etc) to reach the top
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
